script.name: plugin.shipbrowser.buildmenu
script.sourceplaintext:
* ========================================= * X3FL: Ship Browser * ========================================= * Build menu script * Builds the main menu array to display * ========================================= * Author: Cycrow * Date: 27/10/2017 * =========================================
* Info Pages to display $INFO.PERFORMANCE = 1 $INFO.WEAPONS = 2 $INFO.CARGO = 3 $INFO.PURCHASE = 4 $INFO.CUSTOM = 5
gosub sub.GetVars
* Create the filter arrays gosub sub.BuildFilters
* Get the columns for the current page gosub sub.GetColumns
$click.sort = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.columnclick' if $click.sort set global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.columnclick' value=null $max.columns = size of array $array.columns $column = 0 $x = 0 while $column < $max.columns $column.name = $array.columns[$column] inc $column =
$column.width = $table.columns[$column.name]
skip if $x $column.width = $column.width + 10 $x = $x + $column.width do if $x >= $click.sort break end
if not $table.columns.dontsort[$column.name] $i = size of array $array.sortby.values while $i dec $i = $column.sort = $array.sortby.values[$i]
if $column.sort == $column.name if $column.sort.value == $i $column.sort.order = 1 - $column.sort.order else $column.sort.order = 0 end $column.sort.value = $i set global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.sort' value=$column.sort.value set global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.sortorder' value=$column.sort.order break end end end end
$menu.width = get menu width: widthtype=[MenuWidth.Huge]
$menu = create custom menu array $text = read text: page=35 id=1104005 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text
set menu option: $menu, icon=146 set menu option: $menu, widthtype=[MenuWidth.Huge] set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.Identity], id='info' set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE]
* Display the filter value selection $values.width = 260 $text = read text: page=35 id=1104347 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$array.filter.classes, default=$filter.class, return id='filter.class', width=$values.width allowtabs=[TRUE] $text = read text: page=35 id=4267 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$array.filter.races, default=$filter.race, return id='filter.race', width=$values.width allowtabs=[TRUE] $value = array alloc: size=4 $text = read text: page=35 id=1100006 $value[0] = $text $text = read text: page=35 id=1104348 $value[1] = $text $text = read text: page=35 id=1102452 $value[2] = $text $text = read text: page=35 id=1102701 $value[3] = $text $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104801 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$value, default=$filter.buyable, return id='buyable', width=$values.width allowtabs=[TRUE] $text = read text: page=35 id=1104432 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$array.filter.weapons, default=$filter.weapon, return id='filter.weapon', width=$values.width allowtabs=[TRUE] $text = read text: page=35 id=1104433 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$array.filter.missiles, default=$filter.missile, return id='filter.missile', width=$values.width allowtabs=[TRUE] $text = read text: page=35 id=1104434 $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='reset.filter' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret add section to custom menu: $menu
$text = read text: page=35 id=1104349 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$array.information, default=$current.page, return id='information', width=$values.width allowtabs=[TRUE] if not $column.sort.value $column.sort = $array.sortby.values[0] else $column.sort = $array.sortby.values[$column.sort.value] end $text = read text: page=35 id=1104350 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$array.sortby, default=$column.sort.value, return id='sortby', width=$values.width allowtabs=[TRUE] $text = read text: page=35 id=1104352 $text2 = read text: page=35 id=1104353 $value = create new array, arguments=$text, $text2, null, null, null $text = read text: page=35 id=1104351 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$value, default=$column.sort.order, return id='sortorder', width=$values.width allowtabs=[TRUE]
$text = read text: page=35 id=1104435 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text nextinput='config' value='config'
* Add the compare line with current compare shiptypes $compare.ships.count = 0 add section to custom menu: $menu $column.text = array alloc: size=0 $i = size of array $array.compare $pos = 80 $size = ( $menu.width - $pos - 50 ) / $i $text = read text: page=35 id=1104354 $name.len = get string font length: $text $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$pos right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text append $text to array $column.text while $i dec $i = $shiptype = $array.compare[$i] $column.pos = $pos + ( $size * $i ) $text = create custom menu column string, position=$column.pos length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text='[' append $text to array $column.text $column.pos = $column.pos + 10 if $shiptype inc $compare.ships.count = $text = create custom menu string type icon: type=$shiptype $text = create custom menu column string, position=$column.pos length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text append $text to array $column.text end $column.pos = $column.pos + 10 $len = $size - 30 if $shiptype $text = create custom menu column string, position=$column.pos length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$shiptype append $text to array $column.text end $column.pos = $column.pos + $len $text = create custom menu column string, position=$column.pos length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=']' append $text to array $column.text end if $compare.ships.count < 2 set menu line option: $menu, text colour=[MenuColour.Disabled] set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=[MenuColour.Disabled] add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$column.text else $text = create custom menu column string, position=$name.len length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Blue] text='c' append $text to array $column.text set menu line option: $menu, hotkey='c' jumpto=[FALSE] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$column.text nextinput='compare' value=$array.compare end
* Buil the header for the columns $column.text = array alloc: size=0 $x = 0 $max.columns = size of array $array.columns $column = 0 while $column < $max.columns $column.name = $array.columns[$column] inc $column = $column.width = $table.columns[$column.name] $text = $table.column.names[$column.name] skip if $x $column.width = $column.width + 10 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$x length=$column.width right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text append $text to array $column.text $x = $x + $column.width end add clickable heading: menu=$menu, text=$column.text, id='sort', allow empty=[FALSE] $added = [FALSE]
* Display the ship data if not $column.data $text = read text: page=35 id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text else if size of table $column.data $aShipTypes = array alloc: size=0 $aSortData = array alloc: size=0
$shiptype = get next key: table=$column.data key=null while $shiptype if is datatype[ $shiptype ] == DATATYPE_WARE $data = $column.data[$shiptype] $sort.by = $data[$column.sort][0] do if $sort.by == null $sort.by = ' ' append $sort.by to array $aSortData append $shiptype to array $aShipTypes end $shiptype = get next key: table=$column.data key=$shiptype end
$aShipTypes = sort array: data=$aShipTypes sort values=$aSortData if not $column.sort.order $aShipTypes = reverse array $aShipTypes end
$table.weapons = table alloc
$i = size of array $aShipTypes while $i dec $i = $shiptype = $aShipTypes[$i] skip if is datatype[ $shiptype ] == DATATYPE_WARE continue gosub sub.CheckFilters do if $ret.filtered continue
$added = [TRUE]
$data = $column.data[$shiptype] $x = 10 $colour = [MenuColour.Normal] if $array.compare do if find $shiptype in array: $array.compare $colour = [MenuColour.Green] end
$lasers = $data['lasers.table'][1] $table.weapons = merge tables, $table.weapons, $lasers, null, null, null
if $colour == [MenuColour.Normal] AND $display.noto skip if $data['hasnoto'][0] $colour = [MenuColour.Red] end
$column.text = array alloc: size=0 $text = create custom menu string type icon: type=$shiptype $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$x right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text append $text to array $column.text
$column = 0 while $column < $max.columns $column.name = $array.columns[$column] $column.width = $table.columns[$column.name] inc $column =
$text = $data[$column.name] if $text if not size of array $text $text = ' ' else if not is datatype[ $text ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $text = ' ' else $text = $text[1] end end skip if $text $text = ' ' $text = create custom menu column string, position=$x length=$column.width right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text append $text to array $column.text $x = $x + $column.width end
set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=$colour set menu line option: $menu, text colour=$colour set menu line option: $menu, description=$shiptype set menu line option: $menu, video display ware=$shiptype $text.id = get text id: ware=$shiptype inc $text.id = set menu line option: $menu, voiced description page=17, id=$text.id $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$shiptype add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$column.text returnvalue=$ret end end
if not $added $text = read text: page=35 id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text end
if $display.weapons if size of table $table.weapons $text = read text: page=35 id=1104355 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text $array.weapons = get keys: table=$table.weapons $array.weapons = sort array $array.weapons
$i = 0 $size = size of array $array.weapons while $i < $size $value = $array.weapons[$i] $column.text = array alloc: size=0 $text = create custom menu string rect: width=5 y=1 height=11 raw colour=[RectC.Bracket] $text = create custom menu column string, position=5 length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text append $text to array $column.text $colour = get laser colour: laser type=$value $text = create custom menu string rect: width=3 y=2 height=9 raw colour=$colour $text = create custom menu column string, position=6 length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text append $text to array $column.text $text = create custom menu column string, position=30 length=-1 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$value append $text to array $column.text add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$column.text inc $i = end end end
return $menu
sub.BuildFilters: $text = read text: page=35 id=1102452 $array.filter.classes = create new array, arguments=$text, Fighter, Freighter, null, null append M1 to array $array.filter.classes append M2 to array $array.filter.classes $text = read text: page=37 id=2500 append $text to array $array.filter.classes $text = read text: page=37 id=2504 append $text to array $array.filter.classes append M7 to array $array.filter.classes append M6 to array $array.filter.classes append M8 to array $array.filter.classes append M3 to array $array.filter.classes append M4 to array $array.filter.classes append M5 to array $array.filter.classes append TL to array $array.filter.classes append TM to array $array.filter.classes append TP to array $array.filter.classes append TS to array $array.filter.classes append Drone to array $array.filter.classes $table.classes = $column.data['classes'] $i = size of array $array.filter.classes while $i > 3 dec $i = $value = $array.filter.classes[$i] skip if $table.classes[$value] remove element from array $array.filter.classes at index $i end $text = read text: page=35 id=1102452 $array.filter.races = $column.data['races'] $size = size of array $array.filter.races dec $size = $array.filter.races = clone array $array.filter.races : index 0 ... $size insert $text into array $array.filter.races at index 0
$array.filter.weapons = $column.data['weapons'] $size = size of array $array.filter.weapons $array.filter.weapons = clone array $array.filter.weapons : index 0 ... $size $text = read text: page=35 id=1102452 insert $text into array $array.filter.weapons at index 0
$array.filter.missiles = $column.data['missiles'] $size = size of array $array.filter.missiles $array.filter.missiles = clone array $array.filter.missiles : index 0 ... $size insert $text into array $array.filter.missiles at index 0
$array.information = array alloc: size=5 $text = read text: page=37 id=82 $array.information[0] = $text $text = read text: page=35 id=1104431 $array.information[$INFO.PERFORMANCE] = $text $text = read text: page=35 id=713 $array.information[$INFO.WEAPONS] = $text $text = read text: page=35 id=9212 $array.information[$INFO.CARGO] = $text $text = read text: page=37 id=78 $array.information[$INFO.PURCHASE] = $text if $table.customcolumns if size of table $table.customcolumns $array = get keys: table=$table.customcolumns $array = sort array $array $array = reverse array $array $i = size of array $array while $i dec $i = $custom.name = $array[$i] $array.columns = $table.customcolumns[$custom.name] do if size of array $array.columns append $custom.name to array $array.information end end end $size = size of array $array.information if $current.page >= $size $current.page = 0 end endsub
sub.GetColumns: $display.weapons = [FALSE] $display.noto = [FALSE] $array.additional.sort = array alloc: size=0 if not $current.page $array.columns = array alloc: size=12 $array.columns[0] = 'name' $array.columns[1] = 'race' $array.columns[2] = 'class' $array.columns[3] = 'maxspeed' $array.columns[4] = 'laser' $array.columns[5] = 'shield' $array.columns[6] = 'tc' $array.columns[7] = 'maxcargo' $array.columns[8] = 'hull' $array.columns[9] = 'hangar' $array.columns[10] = 'guns' $array.columns[11] = 'turrets' else if $current.page == $INFO.PERFORMANCE $array.columns = array alloc: size=8 $array.columns[0] = 'name' $array.columns[1] = 'class' $array.columns[2] = 'minmaxspeed' $array.columns[3] = 'laser' $array.columns[4] = 'laserreload' $array.columns[5] = 'gen' $array.columns[6] = 'minmaxaccel' $array.columns[7] = 'minmaxsteer' else if $current.page == $INFO.WEAPONS $display.weapons = [TRUE] $array.columns = array alloc: size=8 $array.columns[0] = 'name' $array.columns[1] = 'class' $array.columns[2] = 'laserandreload' $array.columns[3] = 'guns' $array.columns[4] = 'combine.guns' $array.columns[5] = 'combine.turrets' $array.columns[6] = 'turrettypes' $array.columns[7] = 'weaponmask' else if $current.page == $INFO.CARGO $array.columns = array alloc: size=9 $array.columns[0] = 'name' $array.columns[1] = 'class' $array.columns[2] = 'minmaxcargo' $array.columns[3] = 'tc' $array.columns[4] = 'hangar' $array.columns[5] = 'docks' $array.columns[6] = 'sparecargo' $array.columns[7] = 'marines' $array.columns[8] = 'docktypes' else if $current.page == $INFO.PURCHASE $display.noto = [TRUE] $array.columns = array alloc: size=6 $array.columns[0] = 'name' $array.columns[1] = 'class' $array.columns[2] = 'race' $array.columns[3] = 'closest.sy' $array.columns[4] = 'noto' $array.columns[5] = 'price' else if $current.page >= $INFO.CUSTOM $custom.name = $array.information[$current.page] $array.columns = $table.customcolumns[$custom.name] end $size = size of array $array.columns $array.sortby.values = array alloc: size=0 $sub.I = 0 while $sub.I < $size $sub.Value = $array.columns[$sub.I] if not $table.columns.dontsort[$sub.Value] if $table.sort.replace[$sub.Value] $array = $table.sort.replace[$sub.Value] $array.sortby.values = merge arrays, $array.sortby.values, $array, null, null, null else append $sub.Value to array $array.sortby.values end end inc $sub.I = end do if size of array $array.additional.sort $array.sortby.values = merge arrays, $array.sortby.values, $array.additional.sort, null, null, null $sub.I = size of array $array.sortby.values $array.sortby = array alloc: size=$sub.I while $sub.I dec $sub.I = $sub.Value = $array.sortby.values[$sub.I] $sub.Value = $table.column.longnames[$sub.Value] $array.sortby[$sub.I] = $sub.Value end endsub
sub.CheckFilters: $ret.filtered = [FALSE] if $filter.class $class = get ship class from subtype: $shiptype $sub.Value = $array.filter.classes[$filter.class] $check.text = read text: page=37 id=2500 $check.text2 = read text: page=37 id=2504 if $sub.Value == $check.text if not $class -> is of class M7 $ret.filtered = [TRUE] else if not is missile boat: shiptype=$shiptype $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end else if $sub.Value == $check.text2 if not $class -> is of class M7D $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end else if $sub.Value == Drone if not $class -> is of class Special Drone $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end else if not $class -> is of class $sub.Value $ret.filtered = [TRUE] else if $class -> is of class M7 if is missile boat: shiptype=$shiptype $ret.filtered = [TRUE] else if $class -> is of class M7D $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end else if $class -> is of class Special Drone $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end end end if $filter.missile $sub.Value = $array.filter.missiles[$filter.missile] $array = $column.data[$shiptype]['missiles'] $array = $array[1] skip if find $sub.Value in array: $array $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end if $filter.weapon $sub.Value = $array.filter.weapons[$filter.weapon] $table = $column.data[$shiptype]['all.lasers'] $table = $table[1] skip if $table[$sub.Value] $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end if $filter.race $sub.Value = $array.filter.races[$filter.race] $maker.race = $column.data[$shiptype]['race'] $maker.race = $maker.race[0] skip if $maker.race == $sub.Value $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end if ! $filter.buyable OR $filter.buyable == 1 $shipyard = $column.data[$shiptype]['closest.sy'] if not $shipyard $ret.filtered = [TRUE] else if $filter.buyable == 1 if not size of array $shipyard $ret.filtered = [TRUE] else $shipyard = $shipyard[0] if is datatype[ $shipyard ] == DATATYPE_STRING $ret.filtered = [TRUE] else $noto = get notority require to buy ware: $shiptype $owner = $shipyard -> get owner race $player.noto = get notoriety from race $owner to race Player do if $noto > $player.noto $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end end end else if $filter.buyable == 3 skip if player HQ has blueprints for: type=$shiptype $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end if $filter.search AND ! $ret.filtered if not case insensitive string match, is $filter.search in $shiptype $ret.filtered = [TRUE] end end endsub
sub.GetVars: $filter.search = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.search' $filter.class = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.class' $filter.weapon = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.weapon' $filter.missile = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.missile' $filter.race = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.race' $current.page = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.page' $filter.buyable = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.buyable' $table.customcolumns = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.custom' $column.sort.value = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.sort' $column.sort.order = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.sortorder' $array.compare = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.compare' $array.compare.pos = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.comparepos' $sub.Data = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.data' $table.columns = $sub.Data[0] $table.column.names = $sub.Data[1] $table.columns.dontsort = $sub.Data[2] $table.column.longnames = $sub.Data[3] $table.sort.replace = $sub.Data[4] $column.data = get global variable: name='egosoft.shipbrowser.columndata' endsub return null

comment.var: Builds the main menu array to display
Get the columns for the current page

line.text: add custom menu heading to array
create menu return value: callback, value=
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array

comment.var: Add the compare line with current compare shiptypes

line.text: create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu string type icon: type=
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu column string, position=
add custom menu item to array

comment.var: Buil the header for the columns

line.text: create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu string type icon: type=
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu column string, position=
create menu return value: callback, value=
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu heading to array
create custom menu string rect: width=
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu string rect: width=
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu column string, position=
get notority require to buy ware:
player HQ has blueprints for: type=

sval.val: Builds the main menu array to display
Get the columns for the current page
Add the compare line with current compare shiptypes
Buil the header for the columns
